Class ShipCoords

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.player.ShipCoords
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ShipCoords extends Object implements Serializable
Class representing coordinates on a SpaceShip of a specified GameModeType.
